article_title: The legacy of the last eight years
article_text:
The legacy of the last eight years

Posted May. 11, 2016 at 2:01 AM

article_metadata.description: In the course of the last couple of years, we have seen some of the most challenging events in our nation's history. We have seen “occupy groups” who have staged protests for no greater purpose than to disrupt the businesses of others. They have occupied shopping malls as well as blocking traffic for commuters trying to get home from work. We have seen strife between police and protesters. We have seen unvetted illegals coming into our country from all over the world.On the
